description: Get information about the connection with the provided id.

nested_items.name: ConnectedAt
nested_items.description: The time in ISO 8601 format for when the connection was established.

nested_items.name: SourceIp
nested_items.description: The source IP address of the TCP connection making the request to API Gateway.

nested_items.name: UserAgent
nested_items.description: The User Agent of the API caller.

nested_items.name: LastActiveAt
nested_items.description: The time in ISO 8601 format for when the connection was last active.
